core.planner
Class Planner

java.lang.Object
  core.planner.Planner

public final class Planner
extends java.lang.Object

The Planner class implements the main class of the Java Assumption-based Planner.

Method Detail

findAllConjectures

public Conjecture[] findAllConjectures(int window,
                                       boolean negation)
Finds the more reasonnable Conjecture.

Parameters:
window - the size of the assumptions window.
negation - to indicate that the Problem use negative facts.
Returns:
the list of Conjecture s found or null otherwise.

findConjectures

                                    int window,
                                    boolean negation)
Finds the more reasonnable Conjecture.

Parameters:
window - the size of the assumptions window.
nbConj - the number of Conjecture s to find.
negation - to indicate that the Problem use negative facts.
Returns:
the list of Conjecture s found or null otherwise.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method of the Planner.

Parameters:
args - the Planner arguments: [Usage Planner domain-file problem-file log-level]. The argument log-level is optionnal. It allows to have more log details while the domain debugging.
